item.title: 中国需求疲软，飞利浦下调年度销售展望
item.description: 荷兰皇家飞利浦公司（Royal Philips NV）下调了今年的销售增长预期，原因是中国需求不振对这家荷兰医疗技术公司的订单造成了压力。【原文：Royal Philips NV slashed its sales-growth forecast for the year as tepid demand from China weighs on the Dutch medical technology firm’s orders.】

item.title: 中国钢铁协会誓言推进改革，中国钢铁企业股价大涨
item.description: 在中国主要行业协会表示将提出具体政策，以重塑需求下降和盈利能力低下的钢铁行业后，中国主要钢铁企业股价大涨。【原文：Major Chinese steelmakers surged after the country’s main industry association said it would propose specific policies to reshape the sector in the face of falling demand and poor profitability.】

item.title: 高盛再融资 5 亿澳元澳大利亚房地产信贷基金
item.description: 总部位于悉尼的非银行贷款机构 Pallas Capital 在周一的一份声明中表示，该公司的 5 亿澳元（约合 3.3 亿美元）私人信贷商业地产基金已获得高盛集团的再融资。【原文：Pallas Capital’s A$500 million ($330 million) private credit commercial real estate fund has been refinanced by Goldman Sachs Group Inc., the Sydney-based non-bank lender said in a statement on Monday.】

item.title: 海湾地区顶级杂货商露露在阿布扎比首次公开募股中寻求高达 14.3 亿美元的投资
item.description: 露露零售控股公司（Lulu Retail Holdings Plc）希望通过首次公开募股筹集高达 52.7 亿迪拉姆（约合 14.3 亿美元）的资金，这将是阿拉伯联合酋长国今年最大的一次上市。【原文：Lulu Retail Holdings Plc is looking to raise as much as 5.27 billion dirhams ($1.43 billion) from its initial public offering, in what’s set to be the United Arab Emirates’ biggest listing of the year.】

item.title: 日本的稳定在十月获得了巨大惊喜
item.description:
疲软的领导人石破茂可能难以在自民党通常的舒适区之外形成多数。【原文：

Weakened leader Ishiba may struggle to form a majority outside the LDP’s usual comfort zone.

】

item.title: 梅格-惠特曼在非洲的使命美国技术胜过中国技术
item.description:
作为驻肯尼亚大使，这位前eBay和惠普首席执行官将制衡中国对肯尼亚的影响作为工作重点。【原文：

As ambassador to Kenya, the former eBay and HP CEO has made a priority of counterbalancing Chinese influence on the continent.

】

item.title: 马斯克和他的朋友们正在扼杀互联网上的求真者
item.description:
针对研究虚假信息的群体是民主的坏消息。【原文：

Targeting groups studying disinformation is bad news for democracy. 

】

item.title: 随着降息的推进，欧洲央行的沟通越来越混乱
item.description: 迄今为止，欧洲央行官员在引导欧元区经济向 2% 的通胀率迈进的过程中，基本上都是异口同声。但是，随着他们的目标越来越近，关于何时该做什么的观点也将出现分歧。【原文：So far, European Central Bank officials have mostly succeeded in steering the euro-zone economy toward 2% inflation with a single voice. But as they circle in on their target, views on what to do when are set to diverge.】

item.title: 对冲基金在欧洲红利市场影响力日增
item.description: 对冲基金正日益重塑价值数十亿美元的欧洲红利市场。【原文：Hedge funds are increasingly reshaping the multi-billion dollar market for European dividends.】

item.title: VnExpress 报道：越南考虑限制散户投资者购买私人债券
item.description: 据新闻网站 VnExpress 报道，越南议会正在权衡一项提案，该提案规定只有机构投资者才能购买和交易私募债券。【原文：Vietnam’s parliament is weighing a proposal to restrict buying and trading of bonds through private placements to institutional investors only, according to news website VnExpress.】

item.title: 中国黄金需求骤降，创纪录的价格令珠宝买家望而却步
item.description: 中国是世界上最大的黄金消费国，由于创纪录的价格和疲软的经济抑制了消费，尤其是珠宝首饰的消费，中国第三季度的黄金需求量锐减了五分之一以上。【原文：Gold demand in China — the world’s biggest consumer — plunged by more than a fifth in the third quarter as record prices and a sluggish economy dented consumption, especially for jewelry.】

item.title: 贝恩支持的印度资产管理公司计划成立第五个私人信贷基金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，贝恩资本支持的 360 One WAM 有限公司计划通过一项私人信贷基金筹集多达 300 亿卢比（约合 3.57 亿美元）的资金，这将是该公司迄今为止规模最大的一次融资。【原文：Bain Capital-backed 360 One WAM Ltd. plans to raise as much as 30 billion rupees ($357 million) through a private credit fund that will be its largest to date, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 新加坡金管局认为新加坡通货紧缩 "根深蒂固"，国内生产总值正在复苏
item.description: 新加坡中央银行在其最新的审查报告中表示，新加坡的通货紧缩轨迹已经 "根深蒂固"，经济复苏有望延续到2025年，同时对经济增长和物价上涨风险持谨慎态度。【原文：Singapore’s disinflation trajectory is “well-entrenched” and the economy’s recovery is seen extending into 2025, the central bank said in its latest review, while cautioning on growth and upside risks to prices.】

item.title: 香港发布人工智能金融政策，为加密货币减税
item.description: 香港概述了其首个专门针对人工智能在金融领域的应用的政策指导方针，并提出对虚拟资产实行税收减免，这是香港作为亚洲商业中心所做努力的一部分。【原文：Hong Kong outlined its first policy guidelines dedicated to the use of AI in finance and floated a tax break for virtual assets, part of efforts to promote itself as an Asian business center.】

item.title: 印度顶级太阳能电池板制造商首次上市股价大涨 75
item.description: 印度最大的太阳能电池生产商Waaree Energies Ltd.首次公开募股5.14亿美元，上市初期股价大涨近75%。【原文：Shares of Waaree Energies Ltd. jumped nearly 75% early on debut after a $514 million initial public offering by India’s largest solar-panel maker, bringing back optimism for the market after the nation’s biggest IPO disappointed investors last week.】

item.title: 智利中右翼反对派在地方选举中占上风
item.description: 在上周末举行的地方选举中，智利的中右翼政党赢得了一些关键竞选，但在距离总统选举还有一年的时候，他们未能巩固自己的主导地位。【原文：Chile’s center-right parties won some key races in local elections over the weekend, but failed to cement their dominance with one year left before the presidential vote.】

item.title: 中国被动型股票资产首次超过主动型股票资产
item.description: 中国股市达到了一个重要的里程碑，由被动型基金管理的股票规模超过了由主动型基金管理的股票规模，这反映了投资者偏好的长期转变，而刺激政策推动的股市上涨也促进了这一转变。【原文：China’s stock market has reached a major milestone as shares managed by passive funds overtook the size of those under actively-managed peers, reflecting a long-term shift in investor preference that was boosted by a stimulus-driven rally.】

item.title: 韩元创三个月新低，韩国誓言抗击波动性
item.description: 韩国财政部长承诺迅速采取行动抑制韩元的过度波动，这是韩元跌至三个月低点后官员们对韩元日益紧张的最新迹象。【原文：South Korea’s finance minister has promised to act swiftly to curb excessive volatility in the won, the latest sign officials are growing nervous about the currency after it fell to a three-month low.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚禁止销售苹果 iPhone 16 以争取投资
item.description: 印度尼西亚已阻止苹果公司在这个东南亚最大经济体销售其最新的 iPhone 16 设备，称该公司尚未达到国内投资要求。【原文：Indonesia has blocked Apple Inc. from selling its latest iPhone 16 devices in Southeast Asia’s largest economy, saying the company has yet to meet domestic investment requirements.】

item.title: 交易员期待印度股市迎来吉祥周
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 乌拉圭大选进入决胜阶段，养老金改革遭否决
item.description: 乌拉圭总统大选将于下月举行决选，因为两位候选人都没有达到获胜所需的绝对多数，而一项有争议的国家养老金制度改革方案也未能获得通过。【原文：Uruguay’s presidential election will go to a runoff next month after neither candidate reached the absolute majority needed to win, while a contentious overhaul of the country’s pension system failed to pass.】

item.title: 越南 Vingroup 为初创企业设立 1.5 亿美元基金
item.description: 一份通过电子邮件发送的声明称，越南企业集团 Vingroup JSC 正在启动一项价值 1.5 亿美元的基金，以支持东南亚地区的科技初创企业，这些企业专注于人工智能、半导体和云计算等领域。【原文：Vietnamese conglomerate Vingroup JSC is starting a $150 million fund to back technology startups across Southeast Asia that focus on areas including artificial intelligence, semiconductors and cloud computing, according to an emailed statement.】

item.title: 中国人民银行将直接逆回购纳入货币政策工具箱
item.description: 中国央行正在引入所谓的彻底逆回购协议作为货币政策工具。【原文：China’s central bank is introducing so-called outright reverse repurchase agreements as a monetary policy tool.】

item.title: 香港房屋销售上升仍面临经济阻力
item.description: 由于香港经济前景疲软，利率高企，预计香港房屋销售的上升势头将举步维艰。【原文：Hong Kong’s home sales uptick is expected to struggle with momentum due to the city’s weak economic outlook and elevated interest rates.】

item.title: 对冲基金在大选前抛售日元引发日本风险
item.description: 在日本执政党自民党未能在大选中获得多数席位之前的一周，对冲基金转而看跌日元，这有可能扩大日元的损失。【原文：Hedge funds turned bearish on the yen in the week before Japan’s ruling Liberal Democratic Party failed to gain majority at a general election, threatening to amplify losses in the currency.】

item.title: 澳大利亚总理为免费升级澳航航班辩护
item.description: 澳大利亚总理安东尼-阿尔巴内塞（Anthony Albanese）受到压力，要求他解释与澳航（Qantas Airways Ltd.）的关系，此前他被指控从该航空公司获得大量免费升舱服务，并直接与前老板艾伦-乔伊斯（Alan Joyce）联系航班事宜。【原文：Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese is under pressure to explain his relationship with Qantas Airways Ltd. after allegations he received a raft of free upgrades from the airline and liaised directly about his flights with ex-boss Alan Joyce.】

item.title: 奥林巴斯首席执行官因购买药物指控被调查而离职
item.description: 奥林巴斯公司首席执行官在公司对其购买非法药物的指控进行调查后，发现其行为与公司政策不符，因此辞职。【原文：Olympus Corp.’s chief executive officer resigned after the company conducted an investigation into an allegation he bought illegal drugs, finding behaviors inconsistent with company policy.】

item.title: 波音计划最快于下周一增资逾 150 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，波音公司计划最早于下周一启动增资计划，此次增资将帮助这家陷入困境的飞机制造商提高流动性。【原文：Boeing Co. is planning to launch a capital hike as early as Monday, according to people familiar with the matter, in an offering that would help the beleaguered airplane maker boost its liquidity.】

item.title: 以色列对伊朗的有限打击抑制避险需求，黄金下跌
item.description: 在以色列周末对伊朗的打击似乎比许多人预期的更为克制之后，黄金从接近纪录高位的水平走低。【原文：Gold edged lower from near record-high levels after Israeli strikes on Iran over the weekend appeared to be more restrained than many expected.】

item.title: 日本大选后政局不稳，日元暴跌
item.description: 2024 年 10 月 27 日（星期日），日本东京，一名行人站在 "Nebuta "花车旁的选举公告牌前，公告牌上张贴着候选人的海报。日本将于周日举行全国大选，选民将决定是否让丑闻缠身的自民党继续执政。【原文：A pedestrian in front of an election notice board displaying posters of candidates next to a 'Nebuta" float in Tokyo, Japan, on Sunday, Oct. 27, 2024. Japan looks set for one of its closest national elections in years as voters go to the polls Sunday to decide whether to keep the scandal-tainted Liberal Democratic Party in power.】
